tool_description: Search over 200,000 creative recipes. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/recipe.
title: Recipe by API-Ninjas

api_list.name: /v1/recipe
api_list.description: Get a list of recipes for a given search query. Returns at most 10 results. To access more than the first 10 results, use the offset parameter to offset results in multiple API calls.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: number of results to offset for pagination.

utterances.utterance: Can you find me some recipes for chocolate chip cookies?
I'm looking for a recipe for chicken curry. Can you help?
Do you have any recipes for vegan lasagna?
Please find me some recipes for beef stew.
Can you suggest some recipes for apple pie?
I'm in the mood for some pasta. Can you find me a recipe?
Could you get me some recipes for banana bread?
I need a recipe for homemade pizza. Can you help?
Can you find a recipe for clam chowder?
I'm looking for a recipe for carrot cake. Can you assist?
